attributes.action: make illegal the release of more than auotbiography in a lifetime.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Time and time again we are seeing people release more than one auto-biography in a lifetime. Rarely do these people's achievements warrant one yet they continue to chronicle their lives at the expense of societies time, intelligence and natural resources. For this reason all potential "authors" should be limited to one self indulgent publication.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
